EmailTemplate.name: CAW/SWARKS Ignite
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Future. Your Choice!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Choose a life. Choose a job. Choose a career. Choose an opportunity. Choose friends. Choose skills, workshops, a reunion and a chance to get back together. Choose university and finding your independence. Choose travel. Choose working abroad. Choose organisations that can help you manage, save and invest your money. Choose relaxation and knowing yourself. Choose fun. Choose a range of career options. Choose the chance to think about what you want to do and where you want to go. Choose responsibility. Choose to be the change you want to see.
Choose Ignite!
Ignite! - 29th November - 2-6pm - Sidney Stringer Academy - Your future - Your choice
Join NCS graduates from across the Coventry and Warwickshire area for a day of interactive and fun workshops based around exploring, developing and assessing your next steps in life
Limited places available. Book your place now on the link below to avoid missing out:
https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/ignite-coventry-warwickshire-tickets-12867090815?ref=estw
